Ụlọ akụ Liberia maka Mmepe na Ntinye ego (LBDI) bụ ụlọ akụ mmepe mba Liberia nke na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka ụlọ akụ azụmahịa kemgbe 1988
isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị na Monrovia ma gọọmentị Liberia na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepe mba ofesi hiwere ya iji nyere aka wulite akụrụngwa ego na Liberia.

Emebere ya site na iwu nke ndị omebe iwu nke mba na 1961 n'okpuru ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Liberia na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ego mba ụwa zụrụ nha nha nha na Bank, ya bụ: International Finance Corporation, Commonwealth Development Corporation, Capital Partners, European Investment Bank, na  Agence française de développement, na Deutsche Investitions-und Entwicklungesllchaft, ihe karịrị ndị Liberia Otu narị na iri ise, ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ
Oke mba ọzọ bụ 44.47% na oke mpaghara bụ 55.53%.
LBDI bụ ụlọ ọrụ nwere onwe ya n'okpuru njikwa onwe ya na Board of Directors nke ndị nwe ya na-ahọpụta kwa afọ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ malitere ọrụ n'afọ 1965 dị ka Ụlọ Akụ̀ Liberia maka Mmepe na Ntinye ego
N'okpuru mmezigharị n'afọ 1974, a gbanwere aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Bank for Development and Investment (LBDI)
Mgbanwe ọzọ e mere n'afọ 1988 nyere ụlọ akụ ahụ ohere itinye aka n'ọrụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa, iji gbakwunye ebumnuche mmepe ya.
